[[1982â83 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1982â83]] |} At the end of 1981â82 season [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] has promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] for the fourth time. The [[1981â82 Turkish Second Football League|1981â82]] was the eighth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]], the second level division in [[Turkey]]. They finished 1st in Group C. Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu Executive Committee was consisting of the following: Mehmet Fatih Deveci (president), Mahir Turan and Mustafa Nihat SÃ¶zmen (vice-presidents), Ramon Kumdereli (general captain), Mircan FÄ±rat (general secretary), Hamit Hayfavi (audit), Mehmet Biricik (captain of amateur branches), Åefik BalcÄ± (treasurer), AydÄ±n ÃzlÃ¼ (club physician), Sever YÄ±ldÄ±zÃ§elik, Ramazan Balta, Ãzge Cadun, Basil Dumani, Nesimi SaÄay and Erol Tarhan (members). The club's address was: "AtatÃ¼rk Cad. Toros Ofis Ä°ÅhanÄ±, Kat: 3 Mersin" "Telefon: 153 17"."The history of Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu Club". [http://thumb.gazetearsivi.milliyet.com.tr//ML/1982/06/15/ML19820615001101206.gif Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu KulÃ¼bÃ¼nÃ¼n tarihÃ§esi]. Milliyet gazete arÅivi, 15.06.1982. Retrieved on 23.08.2010. {{tr icon}} Candan DumanlÄ± became the head coach. His assistant was Kahraman KarataÅ. Ä°lhami Ãzata was press officer. ==Pre-season== Preparation games: MÄ°Y-Hatayspor: 0-0. MÄ°Y-Adana Demirspor: 1-1. MÄ°Y-Ceyhanspor: 3-1. MÄ°Y-Ä°skenderunspor: 2-0. * 16.08.1981 - Ä°skenderunspor-MÄ°Y: 0-2. ==1981â82 league participation== In its 19th season ([[1981â82 Turkish Second Football League|1981â82]]) [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] was played with 60 teams, 15 in four groups: Group A, Group B, Group C and Group D. Group winners promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1982â83 Turkish First Football League|1982â83]]. Bottom teams in each group relegated to promotion league (Third league was abandoned previous year). Mersin Ä°Y became 1st with 21 wins and 46 goals in Group C.
